olton Karrick was a painter of some social standing from the city of Baldurs Gate in the late 15 century DR.
As of the , Lady Jannath was one of the patrons of Poltons. She purchased at least one painting from the artist – a still life picture, that Polton was failing to deliver on time. Some time later the same year, Polton Karrick was invited to attend the art show titled "Strange Tides Self-Portraits from the Sword Coast," hosted by Lady Jannath in her Lower City estate. However, the ladys butler–Tarhun Mnemonis, was instructed to gently reminder the artist of the delay.
